Content.title: Know your measurements
Content.text: When you buy some clothes it’s better having the exact size of your body. Every brand haven’t the same clothes size. It can vary, chest size will be not the same, long sleeves from a shop to another etc..

Content.title: Takes clothes with right fits
Content.text: When you buy some clothes it’s better having the exact size of your body. Every brand haven’t the same clothes size. It can vary, chest size will be not the same, long sleeves from a shop to another etc..
